casebody.data:
Friday, March 23, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

01-171. State ex rel. Reder v. Pub. Emp. Retirement Sys. of Ohio.

Franklin App. No. 00AP^47. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of the joint motion to extend the briefing schedule pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6)(C),

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion is granted and the time for filing appellant’s brief is extended to May 23, 2001.
